system.description: This implant replaces both legs and reinforces the hips and spine. Advanced cyberlegs give Advantage to all Athletics checks involving running or leaping, subject to the same limitations as Advanced cyberarms, above. As an action, the character may throw Athletics 8+ to jump 10m horizontally in any direction or 3m upwards. Treat the characterâ€™s STR as 4 points higher for purposes of calculating encumbrance limits. This implant also doubles the character's movement speed to 20m per actoon (up to 40m per round if the character uses both actions for movement). Advanced cyberlegs also reduce falling damage by 1D. Advanced cyberlegs count as two implants (total 4 cybernetics points), as they replace both legs.
system.shortdescr: Bionic Legs to increase movement and carry weight
system.bonus: 2x movement, Advantage for Athletics to jump, Str +4 for encumbrance
